meanings.definition: A path or route designated for bicycles.
meanings.sent1: The cycleways in our town are painted with bright colors for safety.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy riding my bike on the cycleways near the park.
meanings.sent3: Why did the bicycle refuse to use the cycleways? It wanted to take the scenic route!
meanings.sent4: The cycleways through the city are like veins, connecting different parts of the urban landscape.
meanings.sent5: The cycleways winding through the forest make for a peaceful and scenic ride.

meanings.definition: The network of roads or paths specifically for cycling.
meanings.sent1: Our city has an extensive network of cycleways for cyclists to explore.
meanings.sent2: The cycleways in this area are well-maintained and perfect for biking.
meanings.sent3: Why did the smartphone enroll in a cycling class? It wanted to learn how to navigate the cycleways!
meanings.sent4: The cycleways crisscrossing the countryside resemble a giant spider web from above.
meanings.sent5: Navigating the cycleways of the city can be a fun and eco-friendly way to commute.
